10 <x-ui.collapsible.content>
11 <x-ui.p>
12 MVC stands for Model-View-Controller. The Model manages the application's data and business logic, the View handles the presentation layer
13 (UI), and the Controller acts as an intermediary, processing user input and returning the appropriate response.
14 </x-ui.p>
15 </x-ui.collapsible.content>
